dt-example.title: Configuration option
dt-example.info: This is the SearchPane extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns. This example shows sorting on cells with no data present. The default for empty Message is "No Data". This example also demonstrates how empty cells will interact with substring matching. Obviously, an empty string would match every entry, therefore when substring matching is in place and an empty string is selected as a filter the panes will substring match on any other filters and match exact values for the empty string.
